content: welcome warmer weather in the comfort of this smart crochet cardigan that provides just the right amount of coverage stitched in our stay-cool bernat softee cotton the openwork design and a crossed cut make this a stylish solution for summer living a great first garment project you ll learn x stitch double_crochet chain slip_stitch and more flattering on a variety of body types the pattern is provided in a range of sizes bernat® softee cotton™ 4 2 oz/120 g 254 yds/232 m gauges 18 single_crochet and 20 row = 4 10 cm with smaller hook 6 x-sts and 4½ row = 4 10 cm with larger hook in pat sizes to fit chest measurement xs/s 28-34 71-86 5 cm m 36-38 91 5-96 5 cm l 40-42 101 5-106 5 cm xl 44-46 112-117 cm 2/3xl 48-54 122-137 cm 4/5xl 56-62 142-157 5 cm finished chest xs/s 38 96 5 cm m 42 106 5 cm l 46 117 cm xl 50 127 cm 2/3xl 58 147 5 cm 4/5xl 64 162 5 cm
